--------------------
Text: The Man in the Iron Mask is a 1977 television film loosely adapted from "The Vicomte de Bragelonne" by Alexandre Dumas and presenting several plot similarities with the 1939 film version.
Triplets:<The Man in the Iron Mask
1: The Man in the Iron Mask
The Man in the Iron Mask
The Man in the Iron Mask

--------------------
Text: The Man in the Iron Mask (1977 film):  It was produced by Norman Rosemont for ITC Entertainment, and starred Richard Chamberlain as King Louis XIV and his twin Philippe, Patrick McGoohan as Nicolas Fouquet, Ralph Richardson as Jean-Baptiste Colbert, Louis Jourdan as D'Artagnan, and Ian Holm as the Chevalier Duval.
Triplets:<The Man in the Iron Mask
2:
--------------------
Text: The Man in the Iron Mask (1977 film):  Jenny Agutter plays Louis XIV's mistress, Louise de la Vallière and Vivien Merchant appears as Queen Marie-Therese.
Triplets:<The Man in the Iron Mask

Text: The Man in the Iron Mask (1977 film):  It was directed by Mike Newell.
